title: Deviants
description: HIS.I’m not broken, I’m just a little damaged.My heart may be bleeding, but I’m stronger now, stronger than I ever knew.And it’s all because of him.This is only the beginning, but I already know how it’s going to end.I’ll be claiming my throne and anyone who fucked me over will be buried beneath my feet.HERS.There’s not a warning out there that could prepare anyone for this.*Deviants is book two in the Badlands series and will conclude Romero and Cali’s story.*
author: Natalie Bennett
